## ModelNodeOverride type

A per-node visual override for a model entity.

\*\*Category:\*\* Entities

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ModelNodeOverride = {
    name: string;
    emissiveColor?: RgbColor;
    emissiveIntensity?: number;
};
```
